Deciding to take advantage of the opportunity given to her Ice smiles 
and replies "Nothing that crucial, I was just wondering about the 
situation with the maximals. You know, injuries, damage, survival 
rate. I was wondering if I could see the names of recent casualties 
on both sides if you have it, I'd really apreciate seeing it." This 
was her chance to check on her old friends to see how they're holding 
up.

Across the room Lunarpine caught a flash of her thoughts, "Be careful 
Ice, you might not like what you find." he sends her the telepathic 
message hoping she's still being open minded (No pun intended) to 
hear him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster's frown could hardly be seen as he listens to Ice. She was 
> obvioustly trying to hide something. Years of leading a Maximal 
group 
> on various missions have taught Kluster to detect things like this, 
> and having to fight against the Predacon empire allowed him to 
perfect 
> that skill.
> 
> "What kinds of things do you want to know?" He asks, tapping a 
button. 
> A piece of the table slides aside, revealing a screen. "Base 
> positions, recent battles?"
> 
> 
>
